segment.source: Perform Online Activation (Windows 10)
segment.target: Perform Online Activation (Windows 10)

segment.source: Perform Online Activation
segment.target: Perform Online Activation

segment.source: Perform Online Activation
segment.target: Perform Online Activation

segment.source: You can use the Volume Activation Management Tool (VAMT) to enable client products to be activated over the Internet.
segment.target: You can use the Volume Activation Management Tool (VAMT) to enable client products to be activated over the Internet.

segment.source: You can install the client products with any kind of product key that is eligible for online activation—Multiple Activation Key (MAK), retail, and Windows Key Management Services (KMS) host key.
segment.target: You can install the client products with any kind of product key that is eligible for online activation—Multiple Activation Key (MAK), retail, and Windows Key Management Services (KMS) host key.

segment.source: Requirements
segment.target: Requirements

segment.source: Before performing online activation, ensure that the network and the VAMT installation meet the following requirements:
segment.target: Before performing online activation, ensure that the network and the VAMT installation meet the following requirements:

segment.source: VAMT is installed on a central computer that has network access to all client computers.
segment.target: VAMT is installed on a central computer that has network access to all client computers.

segment.source: Both the VAMT host and client computers have Internet access.
segment.target: Both the VAMT host and client computers have Internet access.

segment.source: The products that you want to activate are added to VAMT.
segment.target: The products that you want to activate are added to VAMT.

segment.source: VAMT has administrative permissions on all computers that you intend to activate, and that Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) can be accessed through the Windows firewall.
segment.target: VAMT has administrative permissions on all computers that you intend to activate, and that Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) can be accessed through the Windows firewall.

segment.source: For more information, see Configure Client Computers.
segment.target: For more information, see Configure Client Computers.

segment.source: The product keys that are installed on the client products must have a sufficient number of remaining activations.
segment.target: The product keys that are installed on the client products must have a sufficient number of remaining activations.

segment.source: If you are activating a MAK key, you can retrieve the remaining number of activations for that key by selecting the MAK in the product key list in the center pane and then clicking Refresh product key data online in the right-side pane.
segment.target: If you are activating a MAK key, you can retrieve the remaining number of activations for that key by selecting the MAK in the product key list in the center pane and then clicking Refresh product key data online in the right-side pane.

segment.source: This retrieves the number of remaining activations for the MAK from Microsoft.
segment.target: This retrieves the number of remaining activations for the MAK from Microsoft.

segment.source: Note that this step requires Internet access and that the remaining activation count can only be retrieved for MAKs.
segment.target: Note that this step requires Internet access and that the remaining activation count can only be retrieved for MAKs.

segment.source: To Perform an Online Activation
segment.target: To Perform an Online Activation

segment.source: To perform an online activation
segment.target: To perform an online activation

segment.source: Open VAMT.
segment.target: Open VAMT.

segment.source: In the products list view in the center pane, sort the list if necessary.
segment.target: In the products list view in the center pane, sort the list if necessary.

segment.source: You can use the Filter function to narrow your search for computers by clicking Filter in the right-side pane to open the Filter Products dialog box.
segment.target: You can use the Filter function to narrow your search for computers by clicking Filter in the right-side pane to open the Filter Products dialog box.

segment.source: In the Filter Products dialog box, you can filter the list by computer name, product name, product key type, license status, or by any combination of these options.
segment.target: In the Filter Products dialog box, you can filter the list by computer name, product name, product key type, license status, or by any combination of these options.

segment.source: To filter the list by computer name, enter a name in the Computer Name box.
segment.target: To filter the list by computer name, enter a name in the Computer Name box.

segment.source: To filter the list by Product Name, Product Key Type, or License Status, click the list you want to use for the filter and select an option.
segment.target: To filter the list by Product Name, Product Key Type, or License Status, click the list you want to use for the filter and select an option.

segment.source: If necessary, click clear all filters to create a new filter.
segment.target: If necessary, click clear all filters to create a new filter.

segment.source: Click Filter.
segment.target: Click Filter.

segment.source: VAMT displays the filtered list in the center pane.
segment.target: VAMT displays the filtered list in the center pane.

segment.source: Select the products that you want to activate.
segment.target: Select the products that you want to activate.

segment.source: You can use the CTRL key or the SHIFT key to select more than one product.
segment.target: You can use the CTRL key or the SHIFT key to select more than one product.

segment.source: Click Activate in the Selected Items menu in the right-side Actions pane and then point to Activate.
segment.target: Click Activate in the Selected Items menu in the right-side Actions pane and then point to Activate.

segment.source: If the Actions pane is not displayed, click the Show/Hide Action Pane button, which is located on the toolbar to the right of the Help button.
segment.target: If the Actions pane is not displayed, click the Show/Hide Action Pane button, which is located on the toolbar to the right of the Help button.

segment.source: Point to Online activate, and then select the appropriate credential option.
segment.target: Point to Online activate, and then select the appropriate credential option.

segment.source: If you click the Alternate Credentials option, you will be prompted to enter an alternate user name and password.
segment.target: If you click the Alternate Credentials option, you will be prompted to enter an alternate user name and password.

segment.source: VAMT displays the Activating products dialog box until it completes the requested action.
segment.target: VAMT displays the Activating products dialog box until it completes the requested action.

segment.source: When activation is complete, the status appears in the Action Status column of the dialog box.
segment.target: When activation is complete, the status appears in the Action Status column of the dialog box.

segment.source: Click Close to close the dialog box.
segment.target: Click Close to close the dialog box.

segment.source: You can also click the Automatically close when done check box when the dialog box appears.
segment.target: You can also click the Automatically close when done check box when the dialog box appears.

segment.source: The same status is shown under the Status of Last Action column in the products list view in the center pane.
segment.target: The same status is shown under the Status of Last Action column in the products list view in the center pane.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Online activation does not enable you to save the Confirmation IDs (CIDs).
segment.target: Online activation does not enable you to save the Confirmation IDs (CIDs).

segment.source: As a result, you cannot perform local reactivation.
segment.target: As a result, you cannot perform local reactivation.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: You can use online activation to select products that have different key types and activate the products at the same time.
segment.target: You can use online activation to select products that have different key types and activate the products at the same time.

segment.target: Related topics
